_sText:
This was a map i made for my good friend marclo of =FAC= Studios.

Story:
The CT's are pissed off with the Terrorists for playing their shit music too loud and likewise the Terrorists are becoming quite enraged by the CTs terrible taste in music. Only one way to fix the problem. CRANK DA TUNES AND START SHOOTIN!

Aim:
The map plays out like an FY map. Players can go from room to room across the two apartments but cannot leave the building. Players must shoot across the street at each other to win the round.

There are 2 boom boxes in each apartment that can be turned on (press E). There is 1 Easter egg in the level, first person to find it gets 50 points.
